result.title: How can i enhance my skills in solving Mathematics and number theory related problems ?
result.content: How can i enhance my skills in solving Mathematics and number theory related problems ? my strategy was that pic math problem ..try as much u can then if i couldn't figure a solution . i look at red person and learn how they solve it and read the tutorial ans so on ... that really helped me in learning basic stuff .but this method is so slow ..i need a book or something in math and number theory any tips ?
